details.top: Jaabir (radhi-yAllaahu 'anhu) said: "He (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam) rode al-Qaswaa (prophet's camel) until he reached al-Mash'ar al-Haraam, he then faced the qiblah, supplicated to Allaah,

details.translations: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone

details.bottom: He stood until the sun shone but left before it rose."
